alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Clinton; Jackson; Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 10:55PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Snow showers will affect Southern Jackson...Northern Cedar... Eastern Jones and Clinton counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1053 PM CDT, snow showers were located near Monmouth, or 13 miles west of Maquoketa, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Visibilities less than a half of a mile and winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Trained Spotter IMPACTS...Snow covered surfaces including roadways, bridges, overpasses, and sidewalks. Difficulty seeing while driving. Locations impacted include... Clinton, Maquoketa, Mechanicsville, Stanwood, DeWitt, Camanche, Preston, Lowden, Wheatland, Olin, Grand Mound, Sabula, Delmar, Wyoming, Oxford Junction, Lost Nation, Miles, Calamus, Andrew and Charlotte. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
